= [[Applications]] to try on Linux =

==Vim Editor==

Installation: >sudo apt install vim

====Addons====
- Liteline >git clone https://github.com/itchyny/lightline.vim ~/.vim/pack/plugins/start/lightline
- Vimwiki >git clone https://github.com/vimwiki/vimwiki.git ~/.vim/pack/plugins/start/vimwiki
- Nerdtree >git clone https://github.com/preservim/nerdtree.git ~/.vim/pack/vendor/start/nerdtree
    

==Rofi launcher==

Installation: >sudo apt install rofi
Run:  > rofi -show run
      > rofi -show window

==Rust Language with Cargo==

Installation: >curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh
PostInstall: add .cargo/bin to PATH in .bashrc

====Addons====
- lsd (ls replacement) >cargo install lsd
- exa (ls replacement) >cargo install exa
